body.name: AC3200 Smart WiFi Router with LED Screen - Dual Band Gigabit Router for Home | Up to 2500 sq.ft Coverage & 100 Devices | 4 GB Ports & 1 USB | QoS, Parental Control, MU-MIMO
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 58 mins
Or fastest pickup Friday, February 16. Order within 11 hrs 58 mins
features: 【AC3200 High Speed Gigabit WiFi for 8K Streaming】 – Dual band up to 3200 Mbps WiFi for 4K/8K HD streaming, gaming and more in high quality without buffering. Simultaneous 5GHz 2167Mbps and 2.4GHz 1000Mbps connections available. [NOTE: a modem is needed.Works with most internet service providers, such as AT&T, Verizon, Xfinity, Spectrum, RCN, Cox, CenturyLink, Frontier, etc. ]
【Connect 100 Devices】 – Adapts OFDMA and MU-MIMO technology to reduce waiting time and speed up connections.
【2,500 sq. ft Coverage】 – With beamforming technology, this powerful router provides stable wifi in every corner of your house.

【Built-in Fixed Antennas】 – 8×5dBi omni-directional antennas have been adjusted to the optimal position for receiving/transmitting signals. Ensure you enjoy a stable signal at anytime. Also not easy to accumulate dust, beautiful and neat design.

【4 Gigabit Ethernet, 1 USB & LED Screen】 – Provides 1x1000Mbps WAN and 3x1000Mbps LAN ports for better wired performance. USB3.0 port to share files & media with networked devices. Special LED screen on top of router shows WiFi connectivity and router status. 3 touch keys allow easy and accurate operation. (Technical support email: contact@wavlink.com)
body.description: Upgraded Premium WiFi Security Secure your home and devices with advanced WPA/WPA2 wireless encryption.Robust parental controls - support guest WiFi. unique profiles created for each member, limit online time and block inappropriate sites. Support PPTP and L2TP. Support remote access.Built-in firewall features IP and MAC filtering to flexibly controls online access and time. Built-in DHCP server with automatic dynamic IP address distribution.Support multi-language, provides a hassle-free installation. Sizes : 8.3 x 2.9 x 9 inch / 21.2 x 7.4 x 23 cm (LxWxH)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The WN538A8 smart router brings faster speeds, lesser latency and more capacity to your home network. Achieve smooth 8K/4K streaming, downloading and gaming with ease. Full speed boost capability at dual band 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz for multiple high-load jobs without lag. High powered 8× built-in antennas, beamforming, MU-MIMO and a powerful chip combine to make coverage up to 2500 sq.ft and 100+ connections. Internal heat dissipation design ensures continuous operation of the route. Advanced security protects the data and privacy of all users from malicious websites and port intrusion, providing a secure network environment. The unique minimalist design and futuristic LED display won the 2017 IF Design Award. Works with most internet service providers, such as AT&T, Verizon, Xfinity, Spectrum, RCN, Cox, CenturyLink, Frontier, etc. ( Note: a modem is required for most internet service providers)Router for wireless internet, compatible with all WiFi devices from any brands, 802.11ac and older.

A Router Also An Artwork Designed by Jacob Jensen. Features a unique LCD screen and minimalist look. 3 touch keys make operation simple and accurate. This simple, perfect and long-lasting masterpiece won the 2017 iF design award.

WAVLINK Smart WiFi Router, Gigabit Wireless Router for Buffer-free 8K Streaming and Gaming AC3200 Dual Band AC3200 gigabit router delivers WiFi speed up to 3167Mbps. One Router meets most of your network demands. 2167Mbps on 5GHz.1000Mbps on 2.4GHz. Buil-In Antennas for Comprehensive Coverage 8×5dBi omni-directional antennas are well-arrayed inside the router, no need to consider how to place them. Support wifi coverage up to 2500 sq.ft. (May vary from different environments) MU-MIMO for More Connections 4×4 MU-MIMO enables multiple users access to the router simultaneously while reducing network congestion. One router for all family members & friends. Maximum connections up to 100 devices.

Full Gigabit Ethernet + USB3.0 1 × 1000Mbps WAN3 × 1000Mbps LAN1 × USB 3.0 port Multiple Ethernet ports to meet the high requirements of wired connection, plus wireless connection, it can fully satisfy all kinds of needs. Futuristic LED Display Design LED screen on top of router shows network status, local weather, and WiFi connectivity. 3 touch keys for easy operations. Heat Dissipation Design Arms with interior dissipation board, it assures a longer lifespan and continuous operation.

What You Will Get : 1 x AC3200 Wireless Router1 x RJ-45 Networking Cable1 x Power Adapter / DC12V 4A1 x Quick Installation Upgraded Premium WiFi Security Secure your home and devices with advanced WPA/WPA2 wireless encryption.Robust parental controls - support guest WiFi. unique profiles created for each member, limit online time and block inappropriate sites. Support PPTP and L2TP. Support remote access.Built-in firewall features IP and MAC filtering to flexibly controls online access and time. Built-in DHCP server with automatic dynamic IP address distribution.Support multi-language, provides a hassle-free installation. Sizes : 8.3 x 2.9 x 9 inch / 21.2 x 7.4 x 23 cm (LxWxH)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Package good shope
reviews.reviewText: Replaced old router, more speed on internet.Works great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Placement away from electrical connections will help with signal and interference.
reviews.reviewText: Overall standard setup but confusing to add the matching repeater as they seem to share the same ip for setup, turned the multi-band router is too advanced for the cable modem. I tried support and Amazon didn’t call back, Cable company won’t service connection because it is not their equipment. Will demand exchange for downgraded Wavlink AC1200 compatible with cable modem. Worse I build PCs and repair them, but Amazon customer service talks to me like I’m an idiot and repeats what I’m telling them. I’m beyond frustrated and disappointed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has a much better range than an AC1200. Goes through walls and still has a range of more than at least 300 ft of a strong signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks great but ultimately useless for described purpose
reviews.reviewText: Pro's good design physically,Has the option to turn off router lightsconvenient touch feature for adding guest,auto optimization is a nice touch.ConsSadly no of the above features except the touch network work even closely to rightThe router cannot connect connecting all the bands at the same time so the stated speed is misleading and honesty incorrect.The software look like it was ai generated and then just loaded with no debugging.Tech support is a joke and will honestly do anything to keep from helping you.In short this is awful and the only reason they still seem to be in business is misleading consumers.You want cheap and cheerful buy a tp link.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on February 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't provide the area coverage I was expecting as well as I expected
reviews.reviewText: While this was probably the easiest router, I have ever installed I have been disappointed in the range it seems to provide. I have been trying to get away from the constant buffering on Wi-Fi while using the I pad, and you tube I still get more that I would like to see. That has been my biggest disappointment. The rest of the router has been great, and I really like the control system.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pretty much plug and play if you have a basic knowledge of installing a router
reviews.reviewText: First off, I could connect as soon as I plugged it in. I haven't used it much yet, so far so good. I don't know anything about speeds, but I'm pretty sure it's at leas as good if not better than my 12 yr old router. That's the good news. I'm only mildly tech savvy. I have set up a router before, 12 years ago. The instructions that come with it are a only little helpful if you don't know what you're doing. If you only need basic internet routing to laptops, tv, and other basic home devices the instructions can be confusing because they have a lot of information you don't need, At least I'm assuming I don't need it because I didn't understand it all and it works when I just followed the part that says router mode. (If you know what LAN and WAN and PPPoE are then you know more than me and should understand the instructions.)BUT and here's where a star comes off, maybe 1 1/2 stars. There is a code to scan and a web address that take you to an error page. So there are no further or simpler instructions online. I couldn't find this model on the Wavlink website or any other user manual.Ok you have it plugged in to electric outlet and to the modem or your satellite connection. Now this id the part the instructions don't really tell you. Your computer should recognize the connection and you can type 192.168.10.1 in the address bar and get to the set up page for Wavlink. Explore around this page and you can set passwords, name your connection, those are the basic settings you will use.In my experience using a number of devices and apps, developers think everybody thinks like they do, understands confusing technical instructions, and knows how to use these things. My best advice is to get a 12 year old to help you, (LOL)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good and strong 2.4G and 5G output signals
reviews.reviewText: I definitely bought this unit because it has multiple (4) 1Gbit J45 ports and 4 antennas. The WiFi outputs are decent, too. I can get a 200+ Mbit signal to several devices without much lag. My network carrier seems to always be trying to throttle the WiFi, but this unit handles that admirably. Great unit at a really great price if you need a decent low cost router!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to setup, used as an access point as WiFi struggles to go through thick walls in my building. All running in about 5 minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: Works ok but needs to be updated to work with some devices.
reviews.reviewText: When setting it up it's relatively straightforward.There are some issues with dropout and it wouldn't connect to my Google home speakers.To fix this you have to update it. This is not straightforward. This is was my process.Go into the settings be directed to the website. There you have to search for your product, it'll tell you the product name on the bottom of your router however the website won't recognise the product name on the bottom of the router you will have to Google the product name.Now you've got the correct name so you can go back to the website to download the update file.Not all browsers support the website so the download link might be hidden. On Chrome mobile it was hidden on Chrome desktop I could find it.Download it. Log back into the router. Click on update, find file and apply.Now it works fine, not flawless but totally acceptable for the price.PS before I discovered that I could download the file myself by using desktop view on my phone browser I emailed them and they emailed me the file I needed but by then I had already updated it. Pretty good customer service 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fairly average product, unable to transmit the written speed, furthermore speed fluctuated s lot.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: nice and simple to set up.
reviews.reviewText: I have this running in bridge mode, and it works very well. i found it easy to set-up and theres now a good signal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This router works great for my needs, it has both 2.4ghz and 5ghz so you can have reliable and fast wifi in the house, the speeds are good and its connectivity is good. Definitely recommend!
